name: Beat Up Red Bois With Telekinesis And A Knife
name_original: Beat Up Red Bois With Telekinesis And A Knife
description: A physics-based game about platforming, with an extra stipulation. Each level has an extra challenge required to pass the level, ranging from not killing a single enemy, to not letting your knife leave the screen, or not jumping — you get the picture. This is my first active game, and by extension my first game in Unity.
